name: Strike N Smash
description:
Smashing obstacles and experiencing the destruction physics!

Aim! Strike! Smash! The target of the game is smash the obstacles with as less throws as possible.

Playing the game is quite simple. You simply have to throw the ball and land it on the target bottles by tapping your finger on the touch screen.

The green bottle provides you with one additional ball. Don't hit the red bottle.

Features:

Lots of challenging levels.
Hours of fun for the whole family!
Fun physics game!
Amazing gameplay

So if you’re stressed from a hard days work and want to break some glasses virtually, then try Strike N Smash.
